data.name: Credits_Line_008
data.value: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Origins is an unofficial project.\n It is created by fans of the series,\nunaffiliated with the owners of Pokémon Mystery Dungeon.

data.name: Credits_Line_009
data.value: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon is copyright\nNintendo, Creatures, GAME FREAK, Spike Chunsoft.

data.name: Deliver_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](deliver) I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_001
data.value: Well done.[pause=0] You have emerged victorious.

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_002
data.value: Your team has proven itself worthy of bearing the title of Guildmaster.

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_003
data.value: With you carrying on the title,[pause=0] we can rest assured our legacy will be in good hands.

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_004
data.value: Congratulations,[pause=0] I knew you could do it~!

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_005
data.value: Your story as an exploration team has ended...

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_006
data.value: Now you shall begin your story as leaders-[pause=0]\nfor the next generation of explorers!

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_007
data.value: Witness it...[pause=0] the rise of a new guild,[pause=0] {0}!

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_008
data.value: {0} returned to the base of the mountain...

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_009
data.value: ...where they were met with cheers and accolades.

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_010
data.value: They moved on to a far away region...

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_011
data.value: Where they garnered fame as a first-class exploration guild.

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_012
data.value: And over time, the tales of their feats\ngradually faded into legend...

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_Ask_001
data.value: [tmp]It seems that you have yet to form your team.[br]Tell us,[pause=30] what shall the world know you by?

data.name: Ending_Cutscene_Line_Ask_002
data.value: [tmp]Is {0} ok?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_001
data.value: Witness it...[pause=0] the rising of the sun.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_002
data.value: I am Xatu.[pause=0]\nGuardians are we, of the Guildmaster Trials.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_003
data.value: {0}...[pause=0]\nYou have done well to have reached the summit...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_004
data.value: You have done well to have reached the summit...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_005
data.value: Having triumphed over the battles against the dungeon Pokémon...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_006
data.value: Having navigated the endless uncertainties of the Mystery Dungeons...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_007
data.value: And you've made lots of friendly friends~

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_008
data.value: There is but one challenge left.[pause=0]\nYou must face us in battle.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_009
data.value: To test the successors of our legacy,[pause=0] we shall serve as your final trial.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_010
data.value: Surpass yourselves,[pause=0] {0}.[pause=0]\nProve yourselves worthy of the title of Guildmaster!

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]So, they're really gone...

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Never did I think someone would conquer all of the Guildmaster Trail.[br]But you've proved me wrong.

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]A token of my appreciation. You've earned it.

data.name: Rival_1_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]If it weren't for zangoose, I wouldn't have gotten this far.[br]Our rivalries pushed each other to excel.[br]But I still can't stand the sight of her!

data.name: Rival_2_Line_001
data.value: If it weren't for seviper, I wouldn't have gotten this far.[br]Our rivalries pushed each other to excel.[br]But I still can't stand the sight of her!

data.name: Supply_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Beautiful sight isn't it?

data.name: Supply_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]yea

data.name: Supply_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]yea
